Upload Share Mail 2.4 Click a picture of the feedback form. 3. Click a picture of the classroom. 2.3 Click a picture of Trainee Attendance Record. 2.2 Click a picture of Enrolment form with PMKVY logo and PMKVY Disclaimer. 2. Click a picture of poster of PMKVY displayed in counseling room. 3.1 Click a picture of poster of PMKVY displayed in the Classroom. 1. Click a picture of PMKVY signage displayed outside the centre. 4. Click a picture of the laboratory. 2.1 Click a picture of the PMKVY Booklet provided to trainees. 4.1 Click a picture of poster of PMKVY displayed in the Laboratory. Click a group photo of all the students.
Is the center located at the same address as mentioned on SDMS?\n Is Infrastructure(No. of classrooms, State of Laboratories, etc)present at the Training Center adequate and satisfactory to conduct the training?\n
Is the assessment being conducted at same center, where trainees got trained ?\n Assessment is conducted on the Scheduled Date ?\n
If No , Reasons for change of Date ?\n
Are the Trainees being assessed for same job role, for which they were trained ?\n Each Traineeâ€™s identity checked before conducting assessment ?\n Are the trainees confirming that they paid the Assessment Fee ?\n Are the trainees aware they are enrolled under PMKVY Scheme ?\n Are the trainees aware of the Certification Process ?\n
Are the trainees aware of Reward Disbursement?\n Are the trainees aware of the Course fee ?\n
Are the trainees aware of Auto Debit Facility ?\n Are the trainees aware of the Placement opportunities ?\n Trainee Feedback form available, and signed by the trainee ?\n Trainee Attendance Record Available, and signed by the trainees ?\n
Trainees Enrolment Forms available , with PMKVY logo and PMKVY Disclaimer ? Are the forms signed by trainees?\n
Are the names on Enrolment forms tallying with the Attendance records of the batch (check any 5 forms)\n
Are the trainees given a PMKVY booklet/ Pamphlet for information?\n
Posters of PMKVY displayed in Counseling room ?\n Posters of PMKVY displayed in Classroom ?\n PMKVY signage displayed outside the Center ?\n
Pmkvy Signane PMKVY poster(Counseling room) PMKVY booklet/pamphlet Enrollment form Attendance record Feedback record Classroom photo Pmkvy poster(Classroom) Lab photo Pmkvy poster (Lab

Radiant Welcome Read it together Skip Login Username Password Skip Forget Password.? LOGOUT Update Profile Unable to open Camera Unable to access Storage Permission not granted Cant find Camera
1. Total duration of examination is defined on the exam panel for theory exam and for viva voce. 2. The clock will be set at the server. The countdown timer in the top right corner of screen will display the remaining time available for you to complete the examination. 3. The Question Palette displayed on the right side of screen will show the status of each question using one of the following symbols:
4. If candidate did not answer the Question, it will be consider as Not Answered.
5. There will be no negative marking. 6. To answer a question, do the following: 6.1 Click on the question number in the Question Palette at the right of your screen to go to that numbered question directly. Note that using this option does NOT save your answer to the current question.
6.2 Click on Mark for Review , mark it for review and it will be marked for review.
6.3 Procedure for answering a multiple choice type question:
7.3.1 To select your answer, click on the button of one of the options. 7.3.2 Click Skip,Previous or next to move between questions. 7.3.3 To mark the question for review, click on Mark for Review
